methodsClass.name: _isFinished
methodsClass.rawdescription: Checks if smooth scroll has reached, cleans up the smooth scroll stream and resolves its promise
methodsClass.description: Checks if smooth scroll has reached, cleans up the smooth scroll stream and resolves its promise

methodsClass.name: _scrollElement
methodsClass.rawdescription: changes scroll position inside an element

methodsClass.name: _step
methodsClass.rawdescription: A function called recursively that, given a context, steps through scrolling
methodsClass.description: A function called recursively that, given a context, steps through scrolling

methodsClass.name: scrollTo
methodsClass.rawdescription:
Scrolls to the specified offsets. This is a normalized version of the browser's native scrollTo
method, since browsers are not consistent about what scrollLeft means in RTL. For this method
left and right always refer to the left and right side of the scrolling container irrespective
of the layout direction. start and end refer to left and right in an LTR context and vice-versa
in an RTL context.
methodsClass.description: Scrolls to the specified offsets. This is a normalized version of the browser's native scrollTo method, since browsers are not consistent about what scrollLeft means in RTL. For this method left and right always refer to the left and right side of the scrolling container irrespective of the layout direction. start and end refer to left and right in an LTR context and vice-versa in an RTL context.

inputsClass.name: autoHeight
inputsClass.rawdescription: Automatically adjusts the gallery's height to fit the content
inputsClass.description: Automatically adjusts the gallery's height to fit the content

inputsClass.name: autoplay
inputsClass.rawdescription: Automatically cycle through items at time interval
inputsClass.description: Automatically cycle through items at time interval

inputsClass.name: autoplayInterval
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the interval used for the autoplay feature
inputsClass.description: Sets the interval used for the autoplay feature

inputsClass.name: bulletSize
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the size of the bullets navigation
inputsClass.description: Sets the size of the bullets navigation

inputsClass.name: debug
inputsClass.rawdescription: Show visuals that helps debugging the component
inputsClass.description: Show visuals that helps debugging the component

inputsClass.name: detachThumbs
inputsClass.rawdescription:
De-attaching the thumbnails from the main slider
If enabled - thumbnails won't automatically scroll to the active thumbnails
inputsClass.description: De-attaching the thumbnails from the main slider If enabled - thumbnails won't automatically scroll to the active thumbnails

inputsClass.name: disableScroll
inputsClass.rawdescription: Disables sliding using mousewheel, touchpad, scroll and gestures on touch devices
inputsClass.description: Disables sliding using mousewheel, touchpad, scroll and gestures on touch devices

inputsClass.name: disableThumbMouseScroll
inputsClass.rawdescription: Disables sliding of thumbnails using the mouse
inputsClass.description: Disables sliding of thumbnails using the mouse

inputsClass.name: disableThumbScroll
inputsClass.rawdescription: Disables sliding of thumbnails using touchpad, scroll and gestures on touch devices
inputsClass.description: Disables sliding of thumbnails using touchpad, scroll and gestures on touch devices

inputsClass.name: id
inputsClass.rawdescription: The gallery instance unique id, required if more multiple gallery instances
inputsClass.description: The gallery instance unique id, required if more multiple gallery instances

inputsClass.name: imageSize
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the object-fit style applied on items' images
inputsClass.description: Sets the object-fit style applied on items' images

inputsClass.name: itemAutosize
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Fits each item size to its content, This option should be used with:
- Does not work if `autoHeight` is turned on
- Does not work properly unless `loadingAttr="eager"`
- Does not work properly unless `loadingStrategy="preload"`
inputsClass.description:
Fits each item size to its content, This option should be used with:

  • Does not work if autoHeight is turned on
  • Does not work properly unless loadingAttr="eager"
  • Does not work properly unless loadingStrategy="preload"

inputsClass.name: items
inputsClass.rawdescription: Loads the items array into the gallery
inputsClass.description: Loads the items array into the gallery

inputsClass.name: loadingAttr
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the loading attribute applied on the items' images
inputsClass.description: Sets the loading attribute applied on the items' images

inputsClass.name: loadingStrategy
inputsClass.rawdescription:
Sets the loading strategy used for displaying the items
- `lazy` renders only the active item
- `default` renders only the active item, the previous item and the next item
- `preload` renders all the items, this option is required for `thumbAutoSize` is enabled
inputsClass.description:
Sets the loading strategy used for displaying the items

  • lazy renders only the active item
  • default renders only the active item, the previous item and the next item
  • preload renders all the items, this option is required for thumbAutoSize is enabled

inputsClass.name: resizeDebounceTime
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the debounce time used to throttle the gallery update after it is resized
inputsClass.description: Sets the debounce time used to throttle the gallery update after it is resized

inputsClass.name: scrollBehavior
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the scroll behavior when the active item is changed
inputsClass.description: Sets the scroll behavior when the active item is changed

inputsClass.name: scrollDuration
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the duration used for smooth navigation between the items
inputsClass.description: Sets the duration used for smooth navigation between the items

inputsClass.name: scrollEase
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the ease function used for smooth navigation between the items
inputsClass.description: Sets the ease function used for smooth navigation between the items

inputsClass.name: thumbAutosize
inputsClass.rawdescription: Fits each thumbnail size to its content
inputsClass.description: Fits each thumbnail size to its content

inputsClass.name: thumbImageSize
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the object-fit style applied on thumbnails' images
inputsClass.description: Sets the object-fit style applied on thumbnails' images

inputsClass.name: thumbPosition
inputsClass.rawdescription: Sets the thumbnails position, it also sets the sliding direction of the thumbnails accordingly
inputsClass.description: Sets the thumbnails position, it also sets the sliding direction of the thumbnails accordingly

outputsClass.name: error
outputsClass.rawdescription: Stream that emits when an error occurs, this would emit for loading errors of image and video items only
outputsClass.description: Stream that emits when an error occurs, this would emit for loading errors of image and video items only

outputsClass.name: indexChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Stream that emits when index is changed
outputsClass.description: Stream that emits when index is changed

outputsClass.name: itemClick
outputsClass.rawdescription: Stream that emits when an item is clicked
outputsClass.description: Stream that emits when an item is clicked

outputsClass.name: itemsChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Stream that emits when items array is changed
outputsClass.description: Stream that emits when items array is changed

outputsClass.name: playingChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Stream that emits when player state is changed
outputsClass.description: Stream that emits when player state is changed

outputsClass.name: thumbClick
outputsClass.rawdescription: Stream that emits when a thumbnail is clicked
outputsClass.description: Stream that emits when a thumbnail is clicked

components.name: GalleryCounterComponent
GalleryIframeComponent
components.template:
<iframe *ngIf="autoplay; else default"
        #iframe
        [attr.loading]="loadingAttr"
        allowfullscreen
        allow
        style="border:none"
        [src]="iframeSrc">
</iframe>
<ng-template #default>
  <iframe #iframe
          [attr.loading]="loadingAttr"
          allowfullscreen
          style="border:none"
          [src]="iframeSrc">
  </iframe>
</ng-template>

defaultConfig
variables.defaultValue:
{
  nav: true,
  loop: false,
  bullets: false,
  thumbs: false,
  debug: false,
  bulletSize: 6,
  counter: false,
  autoplay: false,
  thumbWidth: 120,
  thumbHeight: 90,
  disableBullets: false,
  disableThumbs: false,
  disableScroll: false,
  disableThumbScroll: false,
  disableMouseScroll: false,
  disableThumbMouseScroll: false,
  autoplayInterval: 3000,
  scrollDuration: 468,
  scrollEase: {
    x1: 0.42,
    y1: 0,
    x2: 0.58,
    y2: 1
  },
  thumbCentralized: false,
  thumbAutosize: false,
  itemAutosize: false,
  autoHeight: false,
  scrollBehavior: 'smooth',
  resizeDebounceTime: 0,
  loadingAttr: LoadingAttr.Lazy,
  imageSize: ImageSize.Contain,
  thumbImageSize: ImageSize.Cover,
  bulletPosition: BulletsPosition.Bottom,
  counterPosition: CounterPosition.Top,
  thumbPosition: ThumbnailsPosition.Bottom,
  loadingStrategy: LoadingStrategy.Preload,
  orientation: Orientation.Horizontal,
  navIcon: `<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 512 512"><path d="M0 256C0 397.4 114.6 512 256 512s256-114.6 256-256S397.4 0 256 0S0 114.6 0 256zM241 377c-9.4 9.4-24.6 9.4-33.9 0s-9.4-24.6 0-33.9l87-87-87-87c-9.4-9.4-9.4-24.6 0-33.9s24.6-9.4 33.9 0L345 239c9.4 9.4 9.4 24.6 0 33.9L241 377z"/></svg>`,
  // navIcon: `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><svg width="512px" height="512px" enable-background="new 0 0 240.823 240.823" version="1.1" viewBox="0 0 240.823 240.823" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path d="m183.19 111.82l-108.3-108.26c-4.752-4.74-12.451-4.74-17.215 0-4.752 4.74-4.752 12.439 0 17.179l99.707 99.671-99.695 99.671c-4.752 4.74-4.752 12.439 0 17.191 4.752 4.74 12.463 4.74 17.215 0l108.3-108.26c4.68-4.691 4.68-12.511-0.012-17.19z"></svg>`,
  loadingIcon: `<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><svg stroke="#fff" viewBox="0 0 44 44" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><g fill="none" fill-rule="evenodd" stroke-width="2"><circle cx="22" cy="22" r="1"><animate attributeName="r" begin="0s" calcMode="spline" dur="1.8s" keySplines="0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1" keyTimes="0; 1" repeatCount="indefinite" values="1; 20"/><animate attributeName="stroke-opacity" begin="0s" calcMode="spline" dur="1.8s" keySplines="0.3, 0.61, 0.355, 1" keyTimes="0; 1" repeatCount="indefinite" values="1; 0"/></circle><circle cx="22" cy="22" r="1"><animate attributeName="r" begin="-0.9s" calcMode="spline" dur="1.8s" keySplines="0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1" keyTimes="0; 1" repeatCount="indefinite" values="1; 20"/><animate attributeName="stroke-opacity" begin="-0.9s" calcMode="spline" dur="1.8s" keySplines="0.3, 0.61, 0.355, 1" keyTimes="0; 1" repeatCount="indefinite" values="1; 0"/></circle></g></svg>`
}

variables.name: Lab
variables.defaultValue:
{
  render: (args: GalleryComponent, { loaded: { items } }) => ({
    props: {
      ...args,
      items,
    },
    template: `
      <gallery [items]="items"
               [orientation]="orientation"
               [scrollBehavior]="scrollBehavior"
               [scrollDuration]="scrollDuration"
               [disableScroll]="disableScroll"
               [disableMouseScroll]="disableMouseScroll"
               [autoHeight]="autoHeight"
               [itemAutosize]="itemAutosize"
               [thumbs]="thumbs"
               [thumbImageSize]="thumbImageSize"
               [thumbPosition]="thumbPosition"
               [thumbCentralized]="thumbCentralized"
               [thumbWidth]="thumbWidth"
               [thumbHeight]="thumbHeight"
               [disableThumbs]="disableThumbs"
               [detachThumbs]="detachThumbs"
               [thumbAutosize]="thumbAutosize"
               [disableThumbScroll]="disableThumbScroll"
               [disableThumbMouseScroll]="disableThumbMouseScroll"
               [bullets]="bullets"
               [bulletPosition]="bulletPosition"
               [bulletSize]="bulletSize"
               [disableBullets]="disableBullets"
               [resizeDebounceTime]="resizeDebounceTime"
               [nav]="nav"
               [loop]="loop"
               [debug]="debug"
               [counter]="counter"
               [counterPosition]="counterPosition"
               [autoplay]="autoplay"
               [autoplayInterval]="autoplayInterval"
               [imageSize]="imageSize"
               [loadingAttr]="loadingAttr"
               [loadingStrategy]="loadingStrategy"/>
    `,
  }),
  loaders: [
    async () => ({
      items: await getHDImages('jet fighter'),
    }),
  ],
}
